name: Spell Immunity, Greater
book: Pathfinder Roleplaying Game Ultimate Combat. © 2011, Paizo Publishing, LLC
text: This spell functions like spell immunity, except the immunity applies to spells of 8th level or lower. A creature can have only one spell immunity or greater spell immunity spell in effect on it at a time.
text_zh: 该法术的功能如同‘法术免疫’一般，不过该法术可免疫8环或更低等级的法术。同一时间一个生物身上只能有一个法术免疫或高等法术免疫生效。
